meanings.definition: A waste product of muscle metabolism that is excreted in urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor checked my creatinine levels to see how well my muscles were working.
meanings.sent2: The creatinine in my urine indicated that my muscles were healthy.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my creatinine was like a little messenger from my muscles to the toilet.
meanings.sent4: Her creatinine was like a trail of breadcrumbs left by her muscles.
meanings.sent5: The creatinine in the urine painted a picture of muscle activity.

meanings.definition: A substance used to measure kidney function.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician analyzed the creatinine levels to assess the kidneys.
meanings.sent2: Creatinine tests are commonly used to check kidney health.
meanings.sent3: The creatinine seemed like a detective investigating the kidneys' performance.
meanings.sent4: His creatinine functioned as a spotlight shining on his kidney health.
meanings.sent5: The creatinine measurement provided a clear window into kidney function.
